TaxonIdentification.variety_authority: (Kitagawa) Y. L. Chang & Y. L. Yang

TaxonIdentification.variety_name: 雏田薹草 chu tian tai cao

place_of_publication.publication_title: Rep. Inst. Sci. Res. Man choukuo

treatment.description: Leaves slightly stiff, ca. 2 mm wide. Spikes 4 or 5; female spikes 4–7-flowered. Fl. and fr. May–Jun.
treatment.distribution: ● Mountains near the sea, Pinus forests on mountain slopes; 100–1000 m. Hebei, Liaoning, Shanxi.
